Private Litigation Case Title: Adam Jones v. Bath and Body Works, Inc. et al
Oliveras v. Bath & Body Works, LLC

Court: Superior Court of State of California, County of Los Angeles
Private Litigation Case Title: HOLLY VAN HOOSE vs. BATH & BODY WORKS LLC
Notes: Dispute over payment for manger travel expenses.

Secondary Offense: child labor or youth employment violation
Agency: Labor Department Wage and Hour Division
Info Source: September 3, 2019 download of a dataset posted by the Wage and Hour Division at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_summary.php
Notes: Date and year are the Findings End Date in the dataset posted by the Wage and Hour Division, which does not provide case opening or closing dates. The company name is the Legal Name provided by the dataset unless that field is blank, in which case the Trade Name is used. The dataset provides only one address and does not indicate whether it is the company headquarters address or the establishment address.

Description: After an investigation by the Attorney General's Office, L Brands, owner of Victoria's Secret, PINK and Bath & Body Works, agreed to commit $90 million to protect employees from harassment, discrimination and misconduct in settlement of allegations by the Oregon Public Employees Retirement Fund and other shareholders that L Brands' board failed to investigate its former CEO's activities with Jeffrey Epstein and ignored a widespread culture of sexual harassment at the company.
